desc: Hello friendsWe are running a project name, information Technology talent search examination.This project is for the students of class 4th to 10thWe wish, all the schools, the teachers to participate in this event, we wish to collect registrations with the help of this participated teachers and schools.We are looking for area coordinator, all over India, in every district and major Taluka places in India. The work of this coordinator is to streamline the entire process of above talent search examination in his area. This coordinator with propose the project, register the school, conduct the examinations and process the completion activities in almost all schools in his area. Area coordinator is responsible for the business developed in his area, but we are offering this job as a freelancer job, a person, male or female, having good communication skill, having his own vehicle, ready to go for field work, having good understanding and interested in working for educational field can apply for this job, with the help of online interview and some required documents, we are going to appoint the area coordinator at various locations in India.JOB WORK;I wish u2 design a Facebook ad which will display in such a way that we can target our audience to collect registration for examination, invite area coordinator, invite schools to participate and so on...We are having the total budget of rupees 10000 to be provided to Facebook and we are expecting around 1000 applications from the persons who are interested in working as freelancers for this exam.We are also expecting the way, by which we can develop and increase the brand value of our project information technology talent search examination named as : "ITTSE", so with the help of you, I wish to build and aware a brand named "ITTSE" in public. So that I can have direct enquiries regarding the examination and school registration.I wish you to design the ad for Facebook and Instagram, you can develop the theme of design, keywords, target audience, budget as stated above, bid amount, and all as per your skills and experience.Questions from your side are most welcome to understand the requirement in most proper way, I am ready to answer each and every question ask by you. As I wish to start this project very immediately, requesting you 2 bid the best you are offering. Hence there may be laser chances for bid correction.Bids from Indian vendors are most welcome, as they know the Indian customer psychology and the education system in India. Please find attached the details of our project, for your better understanding.

desc: I'm working for a famous multinational company called Lyoness,What is Lyoness?.Lyoness operates  as an international, cross-sectoral shopping community, from which members and merchants presumably benefit through cashback discounts and customer loyalty, respectively.Lyoness announced that starting July 2014, all network marketing activities are to be bundled under the new brand "Lyconet".The Lyoness shopping community currently has (as of July 2016) an estimated seven million members around the globe, who receive discounts while shopping at 80,000 Lyoness (2017) partners with over 300,000 points of acceptance.[10] Through the discounts systems, members receive direct discounts of 1-5% in the form of cash back on every purchase made at a Lyoness partner. Depending on the country, the sum of the obtained discounts needs to be 5 or 10 euros or higher in order for it to be transferred to the bank account of the Lyoness member.
title: Social Media Marketing

desc: Buy Cheap Bargains, Inc. has an opening for an E-Commerce Buyer to oversee the development, research, analysis and reporting tools used to manage the online E-commerce business listings. This position will entail finding skus for us to sell with dropshoppers, buy form manufacturers, do private label and basically anything trending or hot online that customers are looking for. We don't mind selling anything anywhere in the world as long as it is profitable. You will also be responsible for negotiating contracts and making deals and setting up accounts.As an E-Commerce Buyer, you will also be responsible for commerce tracking and reporting, purchase behavior analysis and sku performance analysis. You will also be responsible for the expansion and growth including the efficient and effective use of budget, online media properties, integrated SEO capabilities and ensuring all online pages reflect a quality image.Duties include:Manage day-to-day activities of skus including on-going development, building unique relationships and generating sales of products thorough our e-commerce site by adding quality, profitable items.Establish policies, best practices and enforce standards for buyer information and data analysis.Collaboratively develop online web strategy with internal and external resources to maximize relevant purchase habits.Manage all online efforts to add more skus.Forecasting, Budgeting and development and implementation of business finding/purchasing/maintaining sku strategy and activities.Keep website fresh and hot.Requirements· High energy with propensity towards action· Demonstrated effective use of negotiation skills, research of trends and online tactics.· Collaboratively orchestrated cross-functional execution of buyer tasks with marketing, sales, IT and external resources.· Understands the requirements to create an online shopping experience.· Understands relevant web metrics and how to develop, track, and report against established web objectives including SEO, SEM, Google Analytics, Adwords and social media marketing.Qualifications· Bachelors degree required; MBA preferred.· Interaction with classic marketing, sales and IT teams required.· Successive positions with increasing leadership positions required.· E-commerce buyer industry experience desired, though not required.· Experience with NetSuite or other e-commerce platforms a plus.Please include cover letter and resume for full consideration.
title: E-Commerce Online Superstore Buyer and Sales 10-29-17
